channel.title: Screen reader or something (help with searching)
channel.description:
Well i have an email account at www.mail.com (it was my first ever email account, and the website used to be called www.email.com) anyways about half a year ago that website offered to have your mail read by one of four voices (e.g. like microsoft sam), they had: English accent American accent French accent and german accent. (all women btw)
Well recently i've come back to mail.com to have my mail read (and basically make it say stupid stuff) but they don't offer that anymore. I know that there is an actual site to have this done without it being an addon to an email client so i was wondering if someone could find it (yes i have search with google). I just cant think of anything to type into google.
Thanks.
